Stixbox Function

NOM

    pks - Kolmogorov Smirnov distribution function

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

p = pks(x)

PARAMETRES

    • x : vector or matrix
    • p : Prob( KS < x )

DESCRIPTION

    Kolmogorov Smirnov distribution function

    Adapted from Press, Teukolsky, Vetterling and Flannery, Numerical Recipes in C p620.
